title: European Commission Must Ensure EU Investments Do Not Segregate People with Disabilities (Open Society Foundations) ...
text: ( Source : Open Society Foundations ) BUDAPEST-A new report by the Open Society Foundations details the role of the European Commission in ensuring that Member States do not spend EU Structural Funds to confine people with disabilities to
